tags: but only because this post is about fjord and caleb
this doesnt have to be shippy in any way
summary:
You know what's sad. In 62 episodes Caleb is the only one that has ever admitted to caring for Fjord.
Don't get me wrong, it's...
body:
You know what’s sad. In 62 episodes Caleb is the only one that has ever admitted to caring for Fjord.

Don’t get me wrong, it’s evident the rest of The Mighty Nein care for Fjord, but Caleb is the only one to actually say it. And it’s obvious Fjord needed that verbal confirmation before he could even start to feel like maybe he isn’t quite alone

It makes me wonder if that’s the first time anybody has ever said that to Fjord in his thirty years.

My heart hurts for this sweet half-orc boy.

reblog.comment:

It makes me wonder if that’s the first time anybody has ever said that to Fjord in his thirty years.

My heart hurts for this sweet half-orc boy.

My heart hurts for this sweet half-orc boy.

summary: I am finally up to date enough with critical role  that I’ve seen some of your art, and I wanted to drop by and just say how...
question: I am finally up to date enough with critical role  that I’ve seen some of your art, and I wanted to drop by and just say how fantastic it was to see a familiar name on the art reel, not to mention your awesome Caleb art!
answer:
Ah wow that’s so sweet, thank you! I have to say I love seeing so many familiar names on the art reel, I always feel proud of them in a weird way haha. :’) 

I myself just finished episode 53! Getting there…!

blog.name: midnightjazzman
blog.title: Well... Heck
blog.description:
🇨🇦 Absolute Nonsense Side Blog 🏳️‍🌈
WLW - SHE - Send asks

summary:
Hey so the Forgotten Realms Wiki is a fucking BLESSING. 
I sat down last night with a pen and a big sketch book to do some...
body:
Hey so the Forgotten Realms Wiki is a fucking BLESSING.

I sat down last night with a pen and a big sketch book to do some campaign planning and I needed to remember some names and I came across a page I had missed before and it showed me the ONE element I was fucking missing to make a player backstory work!

I followed up on that by exploring other linked pages and I found out the God Rules for how they come to be and how they work? BOOM another element SORTED!

Watching Critical Role gave me ideas for how to describe dwarf cities and then the FR wiki just BREAKS DOWN population statistics???? Wow!!

Anyways, thank you to the people who create and maintain Fan Wikis. You are the saviors that this world needs.
